0.2.0.name: wordpress/require-featured-image
0.2.0.description: Requires posts to have a featured image set before they'll be published. If your layouts break, or look less-than-optimal if your contributors fail to add a featured image to a post before publishing it, this is the plugin for you. Does just what it says on the tin.
